verses.text: \w A|strong="H0776"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H0776"\w* David himself. Sing ye \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* anew canticle: because \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath done wonderful things. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H7227"\w* hand hath wrought \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H8055"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* arm \w is|strong="H3068"\w* holy.

\w The|strong="H5439"\w* Lord hath made known \w his|strong="H5439"\w* salvation: \w he|strong="H4349"\w* hath revealed \w his|strong="H5439"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3678"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* Gentiles.

\w He|strong="H6440"\w* hath remembered \w his|strong="H6440"\w* mercy \w his|strong="H6440"\w* truth \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel. \w All|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ends \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth have seen \w the|strong="H6440"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* God.
Sing joyfully \w to|strong="H0776"\w* God, all \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w make|strong="H7200"\w* melody, rejoice \w and|strong="H0776"\w* sing.

Sing praise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* harp, \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* harp, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* psalm:

\w With|strong="H3605"\w* long trumpets, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* sound \w of|strong="H3605"\w* comet. \w Make|strong="H5046"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* joyful noise before \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* king:

Let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea \w be|strong="H0430"\w* moved \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fulness thereof: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* world \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* dwell therein.
\w The|strong="H8085"\w* rivers \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* clap \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hands, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mountains \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* together

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* cometh \w to|strong="H5921"\w* judge \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* judge \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* equity.
